results.name: Convolution triangle of A002605(n) (generalized (2,2)-Fibonacci), n>=0.
comment: The g.f. for the row polynomials P(n,x) := Sum_{m=0..n} a(n,m)*x^m is 1/(1-(2+x+2*z)*z). See Shapiro et al. reference and comment under A053121 for such convolution triangles.
The column sequences (without leading zeros) give A002605, A073388-94, A073397-8 for m=0..9. Row sums give A007482.
T(n,k) is the number of words of length n over {0,1,2,3} having k letters 3 and avoiding runs of odd length for the letters 0,1. - _Milan Janjic_, Jan 14 2017
formula: a(n, m) = 2*(p(m-1, n-m)*(n-m+1)*a(n-m+1) + q(m-1, n-m)*(n-m+2)*a(n-m))/(m!*12^m), n>=m>=1, with a(n)=a(n, m=0) := A002605(n), else 0; p(k, n) := Sum_{l=0..k} A(k, l)*n^(k-l) and q(k, n) := Sum_{l=0..k} B(k, l)*n^(k-l) with the number triangles A(k, m) := A073403(k, m) and B(k, m) := A073404(k, m).
a(n, m) = Sum_{k=0..floor((n-m)/2)} ((2^(n-m))*binomial(n-k, m)*binomial(n-m-k, k)*(1/2)^k) if n>m, else 0.
G.f. for column m (without leading zeros): 1/(1-2*x*(1+x))^(m+1), m>=0.
